children.value:
Sets how the solver will advance the physics simulation forward in time.
This option is not scriptable and must be set from the
The engine attempts to assign optimal simulation rates for individual assemblies of either 240 Hz, 120 Hz, or 60 Hz. This setting is optimized for performance.
All simulated assemblies inside the workspace will advance forward at 240 Hz. This option is best for optimal stability and simulation accuracy.

Note that when assemblies of different simulation rates become connected
via

or collisions, the combined mechanism
will default to the highest simulation rate for stability.
